other_title: COBRA THE ANIMATION ザ・サイコガン (Japanese)
コブラ -ザ・サイコガン (Japanese)
plot: While trying to steal a precious diamond from a museum, Cobra finds himself amid an abduction attempt of an archaeologist named Utopia More. She is studying an ancient being that may be a key to an invaluable secret of the universe.
opening_theme: "Kizu Darake no Yume" (傷だらけの夢) by Yoko Takahashi
